actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend chapter 7 of title 5, United States Code, relating to judicial review of agency action to allow appeals from interlocutory orders on the assignment or conduct of an administrative law judge, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Entitles any person who is adversely affected in an agency action by an interlocutory order concerning the assignment or the legal qualifications of an administrative law judge to judicial review of that order.

titles.title: A bill to amend chapter 7 of title 5, United States Code, relating to judicial review of agency action to allow appeals from interlocutory orders on the assignment or conduct of an administrative law judge, and for other purposes.
